name: Tap Punch Club
description:
Fight! Tap! Kill time!

You are alone in streets. There is no way but fight. If so, I'll fight as long as I have tap!

Tap to attack, tap to slay, tap to collect gold tooth.

Tap to activate devastating skills, tap to unlock powerful equipment for your hero.

Improve your characteristics, learn new fight moves and unlock new abilities in the skill tree.

Video
